title: The Grand Duke
tags: how to unlock the grand duke
content:
ne. As you approach the submersible, someone may confront you- Redhammer the Deviser. Once you can respond, you can tell him that you need to get to the Iron Throne. Your interaction with him will update Save the Gondians. You will be able to progress through both Save the Gondians and Rescue the Grand Duke. After you tell him where you are going, he will agree to take you in.

Note: You need to carefully select your team and spells before you reach the Iron Throne. Once you land on Iron Throne,
